body: Magma elementals are composite elemental creatures, taking some aspects from earth elementals and fire elementals. Unsurprisingly, a mix of binding strategies from those two types of elementals often keeps these savage things at bay.
name: Magma Elemental
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Outsider Categories/Elementals and Genies/Magma Elemental
